reviewsJson.markdown:
Since it’s Halloween, I thought I might add some quick ideas about a Pumpkin flavor our friends at Noted didn’t have time to check out this year.

**VSO Harvest Moon**

This has quickly become my favorite Pumpkin flavor, and might even be my favorite all-around flavor for Autumn.  It’s not quite a ‘Pumpkin Spice’, but it is very similar to one.  There’s alot going on here, but at @ 14% it comes together really well.  The Pumpkin is very accurate (for once), and the Spices are well-chosen.   Since it’s made with natural extracts, there pretty much no off-notes...  which is quite an accomplishment.  I can’t tell you how many other pumpkin-spiced flavors have either destroyed my tank or laid waste to my taste buds.

If you‘re looking for a more natural pumpkin vibe, go with VSO’s straight-up *Pumpkin* flavor.  If you’re looking for a more cream-forward experience, *OSDIY Pumpkin Spice Cream* is an absolute killer.  But if you want a delicious, complex vape to go with your morning coffee, Harvest Moon is the way to go.  One thing’s for sure - VSO knows how to rock a Pumpkin.
reviewsJson.author: DeeeGenerate
reviewsJson.title: Harvest Moon
